data.actual_result: A few seconds after typing one letter, the app will start freezing. If search results appear for you before that delay of 3-5 seconds, then it didn't generate enough results to reproduce bug
data.expected_result: Search results should be loading in a separate thread in the background so it doesn't freeze the UI. Could eventually be designed with a loading circle on the UI or something
data.short_description: If there are tons of search results in quick switcher, the app can freeze during loading time
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a lot of average sized servers (personally I'm in 80 servers) - Search for something that will generate a lot of results (e.g just one letter, "a" or "e") - Wait 3-5 seconds
